item.description:
Northeast 9/11 Truth Conference
January 31, 2010
10:00 AM – 4:00 PM

Boston, Massachusetts
Encuentro 5, 33 Harrison Avenue, 5th floor
(near corner of Harrison and Beach; 5 minute walk from either the Orange Line Chinatown T stop or the Green Line Boylston T stop)

Registration Donation to Defray Expenses: $10
Call Richard Krushnic (617-276-7839) or Chris Gruener (617-965-6552) to preregister—preregistration appreciated.

Schedule

10:00 – 10:45 Registration, Brunch

10:45 – 11:00 Discussion of revisions to the following suggested agenda.

11:00 – 11:30 Evaluation of the previous day’s New England Regional Antiwar Strategy Conference and the participation of 9/11 Truth advocates in the conference.

11:30 --1:30 Hearing From Each Other: Short presentations of varying lengths, with brief questions and discussion following each presentation.

1:30 – 1:50 Break, Snacks

1:50 – 2:35 General discussion: Where does 9/11 Truth go from here?

2:35 – 3:20 General discussion, kicked off by Lenny Mather of the Greater Boston Alliance for 9/11 Truth and Justice and Bill Woodward of Seacoast 9/11 Truth: Organizing a Northeast 9/11 Truth Network and mutual support organization.

3:20 – 4:00 Open. Use of this time will be decided during the proceedings of the conference.

group.name: We Are Change Boston / Boston 9/11 Truth

item.name: Northeast 9/11 Truth Conference
